TopicTitle: About as close to rocket science as MineCraft gets ...

Articles.Content:
Narcogen and Blackstar make parts and attempt to build moon rockets by using a "NASA workbench".

I'm glad KSP doesn't require us to wave swords at parts in the VAB or peel potatoes.

Galacticraft is a great concept! Indeed, I hope they will make flying in space more interesting Ã¢â‚¬â€ given the way Space Stations and other worlds are handled as separate dimensions, it could have something like Starbound's planned space combat system, kinda?
I use it myself, and boy, it takes a lot- I like it!
